lines.text: Hey, wait a minute, how 'bout trying out Todd? Why, the Thelma Todd, of course. You know, the girl from Joplin, Missouri who made good?
Hello, kid? Listen, I've got it all set for you to make the take.
Okay, Toots, this is the scene that counts. Give. Give 'til it hurts!
Now, could you please, give us one, with a little feminine touch?
Well, girls are funny. They dilly around.
